item.description:
After an intensive summer of research in Italy we have discovered a treasure trove of new Christmas music:

- New countryside songs concerning Christmas and New Year harmonized in Italy for chorus

- Christmas baroque oratorio choruses - North American premieres

- a Christmas Classical Period (Mozart/Haydn) Oratorio which is a masterpiece - we will premiere 2 choruses as a preview to next year's full production with orchestra and soloists - North American premiere

- an Operetta concerning Christmas themes, love, home, family, loss, snow, snowmen composed in Italy in 1905 (we will do a chorus from it this year as a preview)

Plus:

- 2 new Neopolitan songs sung by some of our local Neopolitan immigrants

- and the best of our past favorite Italian Christmas carols

 

Come on Sunday, December 16th at 5PM for a real all-Italian language and repertoire Christmas - admission gratis, goodwill offerings are gratefully accepted.
item.how_to_find_us: Seconda Stella a Destra, e poi sempre diritto fino alla mattinata . . .

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Lunedì Italiano

item.name: Coro-Dante Annual Italian Christmas/Holiday/Winter Concert!!!!!!
